Package agent.core.actions

Interface Summary
Action
Interface for the low level actions
Takes the Agent that will executes the action and the parameters of the actions as parameters
 

Class Summary
InformAction  
ReceiveAction  
ReceiveBehaviourAction Implementation of Behaviour Reception - Receive the rules in the message, parse and add in the Knowledge Base

Uses Protege Model to parse Rules, model is then converted as a Jena Model and replace the former Jena model.
RegisterDFAction Specific JADE action - Register to Yellow Pages (Directory facilitator)
SendBehaviourAction This low level action extracts the rules of the behaviour and sends it to the agent passed as parameter
Receiver parameter name : SendTo
